title: Alpha Client Item Sets
body: We REALLY need item sets in the new client. Riot please add them back. They are so useful for making builds and in game it is so convenient to have your items right in the tab instead of having to type in the name it saves so much time. It cant be that hard to bring Item Sets back, so please i'm begging you Riot to please add them into the new client. (Other than that i love the new client, super slick. Good Job :)

replies.body: Yeah, I really want them back , please riot. :)

Riot pls. I just had 4 friends join and start playing. but this is gone and this is the best way to help people learn shop items out of game so they can focus on learning to play champion mechanics in game.

'm playing on a Mac ( i know, shut up) and there's this bug with the Legacy Client where I can't add items into my item sets. I can remove and everything else but I can't add. THIS IS Frustrating. I contacted Riot Support on this and they claim to have an issue with the Mac OS so fuck me right
YES, PLEASE!!!!! I don't know why they were removed :(
It would be awesome to have them back!
what happened to the Items set ???? they were so useful
